6// ContextMtl.h:
7// Defines the class interface for ContextMtl, implementing ContextImpl.
8//
9
10#ifndef LIBANGLE_RENDERER_METAL_CONTEXTMTL_H_
11#define LIBANGLE_RENDERER_METAL_CONTEXTMTL_H_
12
13#import <Metal/Metal.h>
14
15#include "common/Optional.h"
16#include "libANGLE/Context.h"
17#include "libANGLE/renderer/ContextImpl.h"
18#include "libANGLE/renderer/metal/mtl_buffer_pool.h"
19#include "libANGLE/renderer/metal/mtl_command_buffer.h"
20#include "libANGLE/renderer/metal/mtl_occlusion_query_pool.h"
21#include "libANGLE/renderer/metal/mtl_resources.h"
22#include "libANGLE/renderer/metal/mtl_state_cache.h"
23#include "libANGLE/renderer/metal/mtl_utils.h"
24#include "libANGLE/renderer/metal/ProvokingVertexHelper.h"
25namespace rx
26{
27class DisplayMtl;
28class FramebufferMtl;
29class VertexArrayMtl;
30class ProgramMtl;
31class RenderTargetMtl;
32class BufferMtl;
33class WindowSurfaceMtl;
34
35class ContextMtl : public ContextImpl, public mtl::Context
36{
37 public:
38 ContextMtl(const gl::State &state, gl::ErrorSet *errorSet, DisplayMtl *display);
39 ~ContextMtl() override;
40
41 angle::Result initialize() override;
42
43 void onDestroy(const gl::Context *context) override;
44
45 // Flush and finish.
46 angle::Result flush(const gl::Context *context) override;
47 angle::Result finish(const gl::Context *context) override;
48
49 // Drawing methods.
50 angle::Result drawArrays(const gl::Context *context,
51 gl::PrimitiveMode mode,
52 GLint first,
53 GLsizei count) override;
54 angle::Result drawArraysInstanced(const gl::Context *context,
55 gl::PrimitiveMode mode,
56 GLint first,
57 GLsizei count,
58 GLsizei instanceCount) override;
59 angle::Result drawArraysInstancedBaseInstance(const gl::Context *context,
60 gl::PrimitiveMode mode,
61 GLint first,
62 GLsizei count,
63 GLsizei instanceCount,
64 GLuint baseInstance) override;
65
66 angle::Result drawElements(const gl::Context *context,
67 gl::PrimitiveMode mode,
68 GLsizei count,
69 gl::DrawElementsType type,
70 const void *indices) override;
71 angle::Result drawElementsBaseVertex(const gl::Context *context,
72 gl::PrimitiveMode mode,
73 GLsizei count,
74 gl::DrawElementsType type,
75 const void *indices,
76 GLint baseVertex) override;
77 angle::Result drawElementsInstanced(const gl::Context *context,
78 gl::PrimitiveMode mode,
79 GLsizei count,
80 gl::DrawElementsType type,
81 const void *indices,
82 GLsizei instanceCount) override;
83 angle::Result drawElementsInstancedBaseVertex(const gl::Context *context,
84 gl::PrimitiveMode mode,
85 GLsizei count,
86 gl::DrawElementsType type,
87 const void *indices,
88 GLsizei instances,
89 GLint baseVertex) override;
90 angle::Result drawElementsInstancedBaseVertexBaseInstance(const gl::Context *context,
91 gl::PrimitiveMode mode,
92 GLsizei count,
93 gl::DrawElementsType type,
94 const void *indices,
95 GLsizei instances,
96 GLint baseVertex,
97 GLuint baseInstance) override;
98 angle::Result drawRangeElements(const gl::Context *context,
99 gl::PrimitiveMode mode,
100 GLuint start,
101 GLuint end,
102 GLsizei count,
103 gl::DrawElementsType type,
104 const void *indices) override;
105 angle::Result drawRangeElementsBaseVertex(const gl::Context *context,
106 gl::PrimitiveMode mode,
107 GLuint start,
108 GLuint end,
109 GLsizei count,
110 gl::DrawElementsType type,
111 const void *indices,
112 GLint baseVertex) override;
113 angle::Result drawArraysIndirect(const gl::Context *context,
114 gl::PrimitiveMode mode,
115 const void *indirect) override;
116 angle::Result drawElementsIndirect(const gl::Context *context,
117 gl::PrimitiveMode mode,
118 gl::DrawElementsType type,
119 const void *indirect) override;
120 angle::Result multiDrawArrays(const gl::Context *context,
121 gl::PrimitiveMode mode,
122 const GLint *firsts,
123 const GLsizei *counts,
124 GLsizei drawcount) override;
125 angle::Result multiDrawArraysInstanced(const gl::Context *context,
126 gl::PrimitiveMode mode,
127 const GLint *firsts,
128 const GLsizei *counts,
129 const GLsizei *instanceCounts,
130 GLsizei drawcount) override;
131 angle::Result multiDrawElements(const gl::Context *context,
132 gl::PrimitiveMode mode,
133 const GLsizei *counts,
134 gl::DrawElementsType type,
135 const GLvoid *const *indices,
136 GLsizei drawcount) override;
137 angle::Result multiDrawElementsInstanced(const gl::Context *context,
138 gl::PrimitiveMode mode,
139 const GLsizei *counts,
140 gl::DrawElementsType type,
141 const GLvoid *const *indices,
142 const GLsizei *instanceCounts,
143 GLsizei drawcount) override;
144 angle::Result multiDrawArraysInstancedBaseInstance(const gl::Context *context,
145 gl::PrimitiveMode mode,
146 const GLint *firsts,
147 const GLsizei *counts,
148 const GLsizei *instanceCounts,
149 const GLuint *baseInstances,
150 GLsizei drawcount) override;
151 angle::Result multiDrawElementsInstancedBaseVertexBaseInstance(const gl::Context *context,
152 gl::PrimitiveMode mode,
153 const GLsizei *counts,
154 gl::DrawElementsType type,
155 const GLvoid *const *indices,
156 const GLsizei *instanceCounts,
157 const GLint *baseVertices,
158 const GLuint *baseInstances,
159 GLsizei drawcount) override;
160 // Device loss
161 gl::GraphicsResetStatus getResetStatus() override;
162
163 // Vendor and description strings.
164 std::string getVendorString() const override;
165 std::string getRendererDescription() const override;
166
167 // EXT_debug_marker
168 angle::Result insertEventMarker(GLsizei length, const char *marker) override;
169 angle::Result pushGroupMarker(GLsizei length, const char *marker) override;
170 angle::Result popGroupMarker() override;
171
172 // KHR_debug
173 angle::Result pushDebugGroup(const gl::Context *context,
174 GLenum source,
175 GLuint id,
176 const std::string &message) override;
177 angle::Result popDebugGroup(const gl::Context *context) override;
178
179 // State sync with dirty bits.
180 angle::Result syncState(const gl::Context *context,
181 const gl::State::DirtyBits &dirtyBits,
182 const gl::State::DirtyBits &bitMask) override;
183
184 // Disjoint timer queries
185 GLint getGPUDisjoint() override;
186 GLint64 getTimestamp() override;
187
188 // Context switching
189 angle::Result onMakeCurrent(const gl::Context *context) override;
190 angle::Result onUnMakeCurrent(const gl::Context *context) override;
191
192 // Native capabilities, unmodified by gl::Context.
193 gl::Caps getNativeCaps() const override;
194 const gl::TextureCapsMap &getNativeTextureCaps() const override;
195 const gl::Extensions &getNativeExtensions() const override;
196 const gl::Limitations &getNativeLimitations() const override;
197
198 const ProgramMtl *getProgram() const { return mProgram; }
199
200 // Shader creation
201 CompilerImpl *createCompiler() override;
202 ShaderImpl *createShader(const gl::ShaderState &state) override;
203 ProgramImpl *createProgram(const gl::ProgramState &state) override;
204
205 // Framebuffer creation
206 FramebufferImpl *createFramebuffer(const gl::FramebufferState &state) override;
207
208 // Texture creation
209 TextureImpl *createTexture(const gl::TextureState &state) override;
210
211 // Renderbuffer creation
212 RenderbufferImpl *createRenderbuffer(const gl::RenderbufferState &state) override;
213
214 // Buffer creation
215 BufferImpl *createBuffer(const gl::BufferState &state) override;
216
217 // Vertex Array creation
218 VertexArrayImpl *createVertexArray(const gl::VertexArrayState &state) override;
219
220 // Query and Fence creation
221 QueryImpl *createQuery(gl::QueryType type) override;
222 FenceNVImpl *createFenceNV() override;
223 SyncImpl *createSync() override;
224
225 // Transform Feedback creation
226 TransformFeedbackImpl *createTransformFeedback(
227 const gl::TransformFeedbackState &state) override;
228
229 // Sampler object creation
230 SamplerImpl *createSampler(const gl::SamplerState &state) override;
231
232 // Program Pipeline object creation
233 ProgramPipelineImpl *createProgramPipeline(const gl::ProgramPipelineState &data) override;
234
235 // Memory object creation.
236 MemoryObjectImpl *createMemoryObject() override;
237
238 // Semaphore creation.
239 SemaphoreImpl *createSemaphore() override;
240
241 // Overlay creation.
242 OverlayImpl *createOverlay(const gl::OverlayState &state) override;
243
244 angle::Result dispatchCompute(const gl::Context *context,
245 GLuint numGroupsX,
246 GLuint numGroupsY,
247 GLuint numGroupsZ) override;
248 angle::Result dispatchComputeIndirect(const gl::Context *context, GLintptr indirect) override;
249
250 angle::Result memoryBarrier(const gl::Context *context, GLbitfield barriers) override;
251 angle::Result memoryBarrierByRegion(const gl::Context *context, GLbitfield barriers) override;
252
253 void invalidateCurrentTransformFeedbackBuffers();
254 void onTransformFeedbackStateChanged();
255 angle::Result onBeginTransformFeedback(
256 size_t bufferCount,
257 const gl::TransformFeedbackBuffersArray<BufferMtl *> &buffers);
258
259 void onEndTransformFeedback();
260 angle::Result onPauseTransformFeedback();
261
262 void populateTransformFeedbackBufferSet(
263 size_t bufferCount,
264 const gl::TransformFeedbackBuffersArray<BufferMtl *> &buffers);
265 // override mtl::ErrorHandler
266 void handleError(GLenum error,
267 const char *file,
268 const char *function,
269 unsigned int line) override;
270 void handleError(NSError *error,
271 const char *file,
272 const char *function,
273 unsigned int line) override;
274
275 using ContextImpl::handleError;
276
277 void invalidateState(const gl::Context *context);
278 void invalidateDefaultAttribute(size_t attribIndex);
279 void invalidateDefaultAttributes(const gl::AttributesMask &dirtyMask);
280 void invalidateCurrentTextures();
281 void invalidateDriverUniforms();
282 void invalidateRenderPipeline();
283 void prepareForTransformFeedbackPassTwo();
284 // Call this to notify ContextMtl whenever FramebufferMtl's state changed
285 void onDrawFrameBufferChangedState(const gl::Context *context,
286 FramebufferMtl *framebuffer,
287 bool renderPassChanged);
288 void onBackbufferResized(const gl::Context *context, WindowSurfaceMtl *backbuffer);
289
290 // Invoke by QueryMtl
291 angle::Result onOcclusionQueryBegan(const gl::Context *context, QueryMtl *query);
292 void onOcclusionQueryEnded(const gl::Context *context, QueryMtl *query);
293 void onOcclusionQueryDestroyed(const gl::Context *context, QueryMtl *query);
294
295 // Useful for temporarily pause then restart occlusion query during clear/blit with draw.
296 bool hasActiveOcclusionQuery() const { return mOcclusionQuery; }
297 // Disable the occlusion query in the current render pass.
298 // The render pass must already started.
299 void disableActiveOcclusionQueryInRenderPass();
300 // Re-enable the occlusion query in the current render pass.
301 // The render pass must already started.
302 // NOTE: the old query's result will be retained and combined with the new result.
303 angle::Result restartActiveOcclusionQueryInRenderPass();
304
305 // Invoke by TransformFeedbackMtl
306 void onTransformFeedbackActive(const gl::Context *context, TransformFeedbackMtl *xfb);
307 void onTransformFeedbackInactive(const gl::Context *context, TransformFeedbackMtl *xfb);
308
309 // Invoke by mtl::Sync
310 void queueEventSignal(const mtl::SharedEventRef &event, uint64_t value);
311 void serverWaitEvent(const mtl::SharedEventRef &event, uint64_t value);
312
313 const mtl::ClearColorValue &getClearColorValue() const;
314 MTLColorWriteMask getColorMask() const;
315 float getClearDepthValue() const;
316 uint32_t getClearStencilValue() const;
317 // Return front facing stencil write mask
318 uint32_t getStencilMask() const;
319 bool getDepthMask() const;
320
321 const mtl::Format &getPixelFormat(angle::FormatID angleFormatId) const;
322 const mtl::FormatCaps &getNativeFormatCaps(MTLPixelFormat mtlFormat) const;
323 // See mtl::FormatTable::getVertexFormat()
324 const mtl::VertexFormat &getVertexFormat(angle::FormatID angleFormatId,
325 bool tightlyPacked) const;
326
327 angle::Result getIncompleteTexture(const gl::Context *context,
328 gl::TextureType type,
329 gl::Texture **textureOut);
330
331 // Recommended to call these methods to end encoding instead of invoking the encoder's
332 // endEncoding() directly.
333 void endRenderEncoding(mtl::RenderCommandEncoder *encoder);
334 // Ends any active command encoder
335 void endEncoding(bool forceSaveRenderPassContent);
336
337 void flushCommandBuffer(mtl::CommandBufferFinishOperation operation);
338 void present(const gl::Context *context, id<CAMetalDrawable> presentationDrawable);
339 angle::Result finishCommandBuffer();
340
341 // Check whether compatible render pass has been started. Compatible render pass is a render
342 // pass having the same attachments, and possibly having different load/store options.
343 bool hasStartedRenderPass(const mtl::RenderPassDesc &desc);
344
345 // Get current render encoder. May be nullptr if no render pass has been started.
346 mtl::RenderCommandEncoder *getRenderCommandEncoder();
347
348 // Will end current command encoder if it is valid, then start new encoder.
349 // Unless hasStartedRenderPass(desc) returns true.
350 // Note: passing a compatible render pass with different load/store options won't end the
351 // current render pass. If a new render pass is desired, call endEncoding() prior to this.
352 mtl::RenderCommandEncoder *getRenderPassCommandEncoder(const mtl::RenderPassDesc &desc);
353
354 // Utilities to quickly create render command encoder to a specific texture:
355 // The previous content of texture will be loaded
356 mtl::RenderCommandEncoder *getTextureRenderCommandEncoder(const mtl::TextureRef &textureTarget,
357 const mtl::ImageNativeIndex &index);
358 // The previous content of texture will be loaded if clearColor is not provided
359 mtl::RenderCommandEncoder *getRenderTargetCommandEncoderWithClear(
360 const RenderTargetMtl &renderTarget,
361 const Optional<MTLClearColor> &clearColor);
362 // The previous content of texture will be loaded
363 mtl::RenderCommandEncoder *getRenderTargetCommandEncoder(const RenderTargetMtl &renderTarget);
364
365 // Will end current command encoder and start new blit command encoder. Unless a blit comamnd
366 // encoder is already started.
367 mtl::BlitCommandEncoder *getBlitCommandEncoder();
368
369 // Will end current command encoder and start new compute command encoder. Unless a compute
370 // command encoder is already started.
371 mtl::ComputeCommandEncoder *getComputeCommandEncoder();
372
373 private:
374 void ensureCommandBufferReady();
375 angle::Result ensureIncompleteTexturesCreated(const gl::Context *context);
376 angle::Result setupDraw(const gl::Context *context,
377 gl::PrimitiveMode mode,
378 GLint firstVertex,
379 GLsizei vertexOrIndexCount,
380 GLsizei instanceCount,
381 gl::DrawElementsType indexTypeOrNone,
382 const void *indices,
383 bool transformFeedbackDraw);
384
385 angle::Result drawTriFanArrays(const gl::Context *context,
386 GLint first,
387 GLsizei count,
388 GLsizei instances);
389 angle::Result drawTriFanArraysWithBaseVertex(const gl::Context *context,
390 GLint first,
391 GLsizei count,
392 GLsizei instances);
393 angle::Result drawTriFanArraysLegacy(const gl::Context *context,
394 GLint first,
395 GLsizei count,
396 GLsizei instances);
397 angle::Result drawTriFanElements(const gl::Context *context,
398 GLsizei count,
399 gl::DrawElementsType type,
400 const void *indices,
401 GLsizei instances);
402
403 angle::Result drawLineLoopArraysNonInstanced(const gl::Context *context,
404 GLint first,
405 GLsizei count);
406 angle::Result drawLineLoopArrays(const gl::Context *context,
407 GLint first,
408 GLsizei count,
409 GLsizei instances);
410 angle::Result drawLineLoopElementsNonInstancedNoPrimitiveRestart(const gl::Context *context,
411 GLsizei count,
412 gl::DrawElementsType type,
413 const void *indices);
414 angle::Result drawLineLoopElements(const gl::Context *context,
415 GLsizei count,
416 gl::DrawElementsType type,
417 const void *indices,
418 GLsizei instances);
419
420 angle::Result drawArraysImpl(const gl::Context *context,
421 gl::PrimitiveMode mode,
422 GLint first,
423 GLsizei count,
424 GLsizei instanceCount);
425
426 angle::Result drawElementsImpl(const gl::Context *context,
427 gl::PrimitiveMode mode,
428 GLsizei count,
429 gl::DrawElementsType type,
430 const void *indices,
431 GLsizei instanceCount);
432
433 void execDrawInstanced(MTLPrimitiveType primitiveType,
434 uint32_t vertexStart,
435 uint32_t vertexCount,
436 uint32_t instances);
437
438 void execDrawIndexedInstanced(MTLPrimitiveType primitiveType,
439 uint32_t indexCount,
440 MTLIndexType indexType,
441 const mtl::BufferRef &indexBuffer,
442 size_t bufferOffset,
443 uint32_t instances);
444
445 void updateExtendedState(const gl::State &glState);
446
447 void updateViewport(FramebufferMtl *framebufferMtl,
448 const gl::Rectangle &viewport,
449 float nearPlane,
450 float farPlane);
451 void updateDepthRange(float nearPlane, float farPlane);
452 void updateScissor(const gl::State &glState);
453 void updateCullMode(const gl::State &glState);
454 void updateFrontFace(const gl::State &glState);
455 void updateDepthBias(const gl::State &glState);
456 void updateDrawFrameBufferBinding(const gl::Context *context);
457 void updateProgramExecutable(const gl::Context *context);
458 void updateVertexArray(const gl::Context *context);
459 bool requiresIndexRewrite(const gl::State &state);
460 angle::Result updateDefaultAttribute(size_t attribIndex);
461 void filterOutXFBOnlyDirtyBits(const gl::Context *context);
462 angle::Result handleDirtyActiveTextures(const gl::Context *context);
463 angle::Result handleDirtyDefaultAttribs(const gl::Context *context);
464 angle::Result handleDirtyDriverUniforms(const gl::Context *context,
465 GLint drawCallFirstVertex,
466 uint32_t verticesPerInstance);
467 angle::Result fillDriverXFBUniforms(GLint drawCallFirstVertex,
468 uint32_t verticesPerInstance,
469 uint32_t skippedInstances);
470 angle::Result handleDirtyGraphicsTransformFeedbackBuffersEmulation(const gl::Context *context);
471 angle::Result handleDirtyDepthStencilState(const gl::Context *context);
472 angle::Result handleDirtyDepthBias(const gl::Context *context);
473 angle::Result handleDirtyRenderPass(const gl::Context *context);
474 angle::Result checkIfPipelineChanged(const gl::Context *context,
475 gl::PrimitiveMode primitiveMode,
476 bool xfbPass,
477 bool *pipelineDescChanged);
478
479 angle::Result startOcclusionQueryInRenderPass(QueryMtl *query, bool clearOldValue);
480
481 // Dirty bits.
482 enum DirtyBitType : size_t
483 {
484 DIRTY_BIT_DEFAULT_ATTRIBS,
485 DIRTY_BIT_TEXTURES,
486 DIRTY_BIT_DRIVER_UNIFORMS,
487 DIRTY_BIT_DEPTH_STENCIL_DESC,
488 DIRTY_BIT_DEPTH_BIAS,
489 DIRTY_BIT_STENCIL_REF,
490 DIRTY_BIT_BLEND_COLOR,
491 DIRTY_BIT_VIEWPORT,
492 DIRTY_BIT_SCISSOR,
493 DIRTY_BIT_DRAW_FRAMEBUFFER,
494 DIRTY_BIT_CULL_MODE,
495 DIRTY_BIT_WINDING,
496 DIRTY_BIT_RENDER_PIPELINE,
497 DIRTY_BIT_UNIFORM_BUFFERS_BINDING,
498 DIRTY_BIT_RASTERIZER_DISCARD,
499 DIRTY_BIT_TRANSFORM_FEEDBACK_BUFFERS,
500 DIRTY_BIT_MAX,
501 };
502
503 // Keep this in sync with TranslatorMetalDirect.cpp: kGraphicsDriverUniformNames.
504 struct DriverUniforms
505 {
506 float viewport[4];
507
508 float halfRenderArea[2];
509 float flipXY[2];
510 float negFlipXY[2];
511
512 // 32 bits for 32 clip distances
513 uint32_t enabledClipDistances;
514
515 uint32_t xfbActiveUnpaused;
516 uint32_t xfbVerticesPerDraw;
517 // NOTE: Explicit padding. Fill in with useful data when needed in the future.
518 int32_t padding_0[3];
519
520 std::array<int32_t, 4> xfbBufferOffsets;
521 uint32_t acbBufferOffsets[4];
522
523 // We'll use x, y, z, w for near / far / diff / zscale respectively.
524 float depthRange[4];
525
526 uint32_t coverageMask;
527
528 int32_t emulatedInstanceID;
529
530 // NOTE: Explicit padding. Fill in with useful data when needed in the future.
531 int32_t padding_1[2];
532 };
533
534 struct DefaultAttribute
535 {
536 float values[4];
537 };
538
539 mtl::OcclusionQueryPool mOcclusionQueryPool;
540
541 mtl::CommandBuffer mCmdBuffer;
542
543 mtl::RenderCommandEncoder mRenderEncoder;
544 mtl::BlitCommandEncoder mBlitEncoder;
545 mtl::ComputeCommandEncoder mComputeEncoder;
546 // TODO(jcunningham):
547 // Cache the current draw call's firstVertex to be passed to
548 // TransformFeedbackMtl::getBufferOffsets. We should switch
549 // to using gl_BaseVertex -> base_vertex in MSL
550 GLint mXfbBaseVertex;
551 // Cache the current draw call's vertex count as well to support instanced draw calls
552 GLuint mXfbVertexCountPerInstance;
553
554 // Cached back-end objects
555 FramebufferMtl *mDrawFramebuffer = nullptr;
556 VertexArrayMtl *mVertexArray = nullptr;
557 ProgramMtl *mProgram = nullptr;
558 QueryMtl *mOcclusionQuery = nullptr;
559
560 using DirtyBits = angle::BitSet<DIRTY_BIT_MAX>;
561
562 gl::AttributesMask mDirtyDefaultAttribsMask;
563 DirtyBits mDirtyBits;
564
565 // State
566 mtl::RenderPipelineDesc mRenderPipelineDesc;
567 mtl::DepthStencilDesc mDepthStencilDesc;
568 mtl::BlendDesc mBlendDesc;
569 mtl::ClearColorValue mClearColor;
570 uint32_t mClearStencil = 0;
571 uint32_t mStencilRefFront = 0;
572 uint32_t mStencilRefBack = 0;
573 MTLViewport mViewport;
574 MTLScissorRect mScissorRect;
575 MTLWinding mWinding;
576 MTLCullMode mCullMode;
577 bool mCullAllPolygons = false;
578
579 // Lineloop and TriFan index buffer
580 mtl::BufferPool mLineLoopIndexBuffer;
581 mtl::BufferPool mLineLoopLastSegmentIndexBuffer;
582 mtl::BufferPool mTriFanIndexBuffer;
583 // one buffer can be reused for any starting vertex in DrawArrays()
584 mtl::BufferRef mTriFanArraysIndexBuffer;
585
586 // Dummy texture to be used for transform feedback only pass.
587 mtl::TextureRef mDummyXFBRenderTexture;
588
589 DriverUniforms mDriverUniforms;
590
591 DefaultAttribute mDefaultAttributes[mtl::kMaxVertexAttribs];
592
593 // Transform feedback buffers.
594 std::unordered_set<const BufferMtl *> mCurrentTransformFeedbackBuffers;
595
596 IncompleteTextureSet mIncompleteTextures;
597 bool mIncompleteTexturesInitialized = false;
598 ProvokingVertexHelper mProvokingVertexHelper;
599};
600
601} // namespace rx

603#endif /* LIBANGLE_RENDERER_METAL_CONTEXTMTL_H_ */
